name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 039
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, Vacationing In Space, with Virgin Galactic and Richard Bransons recent trip to space the idea of routine travel to the final frontier is closer than ever for private citizens. With 600 passengers already booked, paid, and ready to go commercial flights may begin as early as the next year or two, and with space as a new vacation destination, a universe of possibilities awaits us in the future.
